attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE!
attributes.review: This app is terrible, it lags too much i thought the app wpuld be amzing but it wasn’t it is TERRIBLE I would’ve liked it but not absolutely terrible DO NOT GET!✨

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I signed up and they stole my social security number, credit card number, and came to my house to kill my dog I cant they are psychos DONT DO IT PLSSSSSSSSS

attributes.title: Too Much Blue
attributes.review: I’m Colour Blind and yet I can still tell you, there was blue EVVERRRYYY WHERREREEE it was so annoying and bland, how am I supposed to teach my child of white supremacy, racism and homophobia with such distracting colours!! 😡

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: i really hate it🤢. it’s very very disgusting to me and everything about it is just off. i will NOT be voting for him as president❤️.

attributes.title: Racist, rapist

attributes.title: THIS APP IS CURSED

attributes.title: this is the worst app ever
attributes.review: because i so humbly want to support my 👑 beautiful president 🧚‍♂️💫 i decided to install 👑this app and it just sent me to 👀a porn website now my 👀uncle can’t open my 💃🏻phone and not see 😵“big busty college girl 😵getting her insides re arranged” and then disowning me💫💫💫👑💫💫🌈💫😊🧚‍♂️ thank you 💫

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!! 😡😠😤
attributes.review:
I AM A HUGE FAN OF TRUMP THE ONLY GOD IN THIS WORLD THE ONLY CHEETO I WILL EVER SUPPORT 😍😘🙏🇺🇸🇺🇸 

BUT I AM DISAPPOINTED WITH THIS APP WHEN I DOWNLOAD IT I GOT SO MANY NOTIFICATIONS 😠NOT ONLY THAT BUT MY BEAUTIFUL CAT DIED 😭😭RIGHT IN FRONT OF MY EYES WHO WAS ALSO A BIG FAN OF GOD TRUMP 🥰🙏🙏🇺🇸🇺🇸I ALSO GOT TWO CALLS ONE FROM MY FAMILY TELLING ME THAT MY LOVELY GRANDMA 👵HAD A HEART ATTACK AND PASSED AWAY 😭😣😣AND THE OTHER WAS FROM MY BOSS 👩‍💼TELLING ME I WAS FIRED FROM MY JOB  🤧 I WAS DEVASTATED I GOT MY CAT TO TAKE HIM DOWNSTAIRS AND BURY HIM OUTSIDE BUT AS I WAS WALKING DOWNSTAIRS CRYING MY EYES OUT 😭😭 I SUDDENLY TRIPED DOWN THE STAIRS AND BLACKED OUT I AM NOW IN THE HOSPITAL IN A COMA 😷🤒🤕🤧😭

THIS IS THE WORST DAY OF MY LIFE 💩💩
     DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP OR YOU WILL GET BAD LUCK‼️💯👹

BUT I STILL LOVE YOU GOD TRUMP!!🥰🥰😍😍😘😘😆😆👁💋👁🙏🙏🇺🇸🇺🇸
